typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AttendancePattern as integer,
		Cost as double,
		CostDescription as string,
		CourseId as integer,
		CourseName as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		DeliveryMode as integer,
		DurationUnit as integer,
		DurationValue as integer,
		FlexibleStartDate as boolean,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		National as boolean,
		ProviderUKPRN as integer,
		Regions as string[],
		StartDateTime as string,
		UpdatedDateTime as string,
		VenueId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT c.ProviderUKPRN\n,c.CourseId\n,c.LearnAimRef\n,cx.CourseName\n,cx.DeliveryMode\n,cx.FlexibleStartDate\n,cx.StartDate as StartDateTime\n,cx.CourseURL\n,cx.Cost\n,cx.CostDescription\n,cx.National\n,cx.Regions\n,cx.VenueId\n,cx.UpdatedDate as UpdatedDateTime\n,cx.DurationUnit\n,cx.DurationValue\n,cx.AttendancePattern\nFROM   c\nJOIN   cx IN c.CourseRuns\nWHERE c.CourseStatus = 1 \nAND c.IsValid = true',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> Courses
Courses derive(StartDate = toDate(StartDateTime)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Sort1 filter(StartDate >= subMonths(subDays(currentDate(), dayOfMonth(currentDate() - 1)), 1)) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sort(asc(StartDate, false)) ~> Sort1
Filter1 sink(input(
		ProviderUKPRN as string,
		CourseId as string,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		CourseName as string,
		DeliveryMode as string,
		FlexibleStartDate as boolean,
		StartDate as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		Cost as string,
		CostDescription as string,
		National as boolean,
		Regions as string,
		VenueId as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		DurationUnit as string,
		DurationValue as string,
		AttendancePattern as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['courses.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateCache
